text:
18+ ONLY

So I had an RP partner that disappeared that I miss greatly. I hope they come back at some point, but until then I'll keep posting prompts in hopes that others are also interested.

This is a Matsu noncon prompt, with a big emphasis on heavy bondage. I will be playing their captor(s), while you'll be playing at least one Matsu. I usually don't have a big preference for who you play, but at this moment I'm craving a Karamatsu.

Some of my favorite kinks are mummification, bitchsuits, blindfolds, gags, fear, suspension, nipple clamps, and tons more I don't feel like listing. Feel free to connect if interested!
Should we start another one of the new ones here?
(( sure! which one were you feeling?
I’m either with the cult or police pet. Also I hope you don’t mind that I continuously connect to you. I just really enjoy our RPs and we have the same tastes.

(( I'm totally fine with it! I love roleplaying with you.

I'd like to give the cult a try!
Cult it is then! Maybe Jyushi for this one because he’s so cheerful? Pretty good cult victim.
(( I agree!

Oh! I also thought of two things. We could combine the robbers with the police prompt with the Matsu getting left behind on another robbery and the cops actually keeping him around as “evidence”.

Secondly what about a Matsu that gets abducted on vacation and forcibly married to a noble - forced into a wedding dress with rope binding over and gagged underneath the veil. Then the noble is just able to do what he wants to the foreigner because now they’re property.

(( those are great ideas! Poor guy would think he's safe with the police, but they have other ideas.

I also love the Matsu abducted on vacation idea! He's treated like some sort of trophy, kept as their prize.

Yeah! And the police would have all the tools to torture him through other evidence they’d gathered. 

And thanks! I really like it too!

(( of course! I could make a post in the directory for the police/robber idea. And the vacation one.

As for Jyushi getting kidnapped by the cult, did you have any ideas for how they could torture him?

That’s be great I’ll make sure to pick them up! 

And hmm...I know it’s a bdsm cult but is there magic of any kind involved?
(( we could use magic, yeah!

Alright! Then our favorite setups can be modified to fit actual magic being used. A magic seal inscribed on Jyushi that literally turns him into a doll that can’t move on it’s own and he has to be manuered into positions. But like...he’s fully cognitive of everything and just can’t move his body.
(( oh, I love that idea! I'd love to incorporate latex into that doll idea. would he be able to make quiet whimpers, or would he just be a completely still plaything?

Maybe the latex is the result of a spell so it’s more malleable in what it’s capable of doing. And I think he’d still be able to whimper but talking would be right out because of the movement of vocal chords and everything.
(( that's a nice idea. I prefer the idea of him whimpering as well, it'd show how helpless he is in his state of immobility

Probably some eye movement too to further that. And then the magic latex could solidify when he isn’t being toyed with. Can probably shrink and expand however it wants. Like one moment it’s a full on suit and the next it’s just an arm binder.

(( I like that idea! Another idea I had is Jyushi being under some sort of spell that makes it harder for him to breathe, only giving him air for a bit when he's on the verge of passing out. And I don't know if you're into tickling or not, but if you are we could also do a spell that makes Jyushi feel like he's constantly being tickled so he's thrashing and squirming in his bondage
Oh man I really like that idea! And tickling isn’t really a thing for me but for something like this I can totally dig it and see how it would work.
(( sure, if you're down for it!
Count me in!
(( awesome! a spell to make him constantly horny would work well with a spell that makes it impossible to orgasm
Oh that’s devious! What about a spell that makes him act exactly like a puppy?
(( yes, I love it! he'd be off humping nearly everything if he was horny, and he could wear a cute little collar to go with the ensemble
